BeIDConnect

General

BeIDConnect developed by BOSA provides browser extensions + a native app to enable BOSA DSS services for your Belgian eID card in a safe and user friendly way.

BeIDConnect is supported starting from MAC OS X 10.10 Yosemite

Installation

BeIDConnect will only be installed for the current user.

Smartcard readers

Some smartcard reader drivers can be found on following link: http://belgeid.be

Uninstall

To remove the extension from Safari, open Safari Preferences, select the BeIdConnect extension and click remove. Finder will show you the location where the app is installed. You can now move the BeIdConnect app to the bin.
